title: 17 Optical Illusions That Will Shatter Your Brain - Internet Explorerz Ep. 1
description:
Get 15% off your first pair and free shipping at http://meundies.com/morning

Get your first refill pack FREE at http://getquip.com/kfms

Slack: Where work happens. Go to http://slack.com to learn more.

Tim and nick return for the very first time to check out optical iLlLlLuuuUuUUUUsionnnnssssss.

00:11:00 - Housekeeping
00:13:00 - In Other News
00:18:22 - Optical Illusions
00:31:27 - The Wonders of Worldstar
00:40:18 - Clickbait
00:44:11 -  Slack
00:45:42 - Quip
00:47:11 - Me Undies
00:48:50 - #FunClipz (Brought to you by Patreon.com/KindaFunny)
00:58:45 - People r/Funny
01:01:55 -obfuscaste -  Word of the Day
01:03:15 - Chat Room
01:07:18 - Sub Only Chat Room

Subscribe! http://www.youtube.com/kindafunny?sub_confirmation=1

Support us and get the shows early here! http://www.patreon.com/kindafunny

Check out our store! http://www.kindafunny.com/store

Follow us on Twitter!
Greg - http://www.twitter.com/GameOverGreggy
Tim - http://www.twitter.com/TimGettys
Nick - http://www.twitter.com/Nick_Scarpino
Kinda Funny - http://www.twitter.com/KindaFunnyVids

Every day Greg Miller, Tim Gettys, and Nick Scarpino talk about the biggest stories in nerd culture.

Music by Tonedeff - http://www.QN5.com
